title: Brideshead revisited. Episodes 04 & 05
brief_description: Oxford University cannot contain Sebastian or Charles. By summer’s end Charles leaves Oxford for art. Sebastian leaves for the bottle. Almost a year goes by before Charles is invited back to Brideshead where he is horrified to discover Sebastian is now a confirmed drunkard. Finally, Charles realises there is nothing more he can do to save his friend, so he leaves Brideshead declaring, “I leave a part of myself behind.” Rated: PG
